snippet.title: GAMEDEC - Official Cinematic Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Gamedec launches on PC on September 16th this year! Watch the CGI trailer, download the demo, and dive into this unique, cyberpunk world of the future.

Bringing the essence of paper role-playing back to a modern take on the genre, Gamedec will take gamers on an exciting journey through its realium and diverse virtual worlds on PC this September. Start the trip with a CGI trailer, and then jump right into the universe in the newly released free demo.

Download Demo and add to wishlist: 
► Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/917720/Gamedec/
► GOG.com - https://www.gog.com/game/gamedec
► Epic Games Store

Later on:
► Nintendo Switch.

Gamedec is a single-player cyberpunk isometric RPG. You are a game detective, who solves crimes inside virtual worlds. Use your wits to gather info from your witnesses and suspects, getting to the bottom of deceptive schemes. The game continually adapts to your decisions and never judges.

DISCORD
► https://www.discord.gamedec.com

WEBSITE
► https://gamedec.com​

TWITTER
► https://twitter.com/GamedecTheGame​

FACEBOOK
► https://www.facebook.com/gamedecthegame/​

#gamedec​ #rpg​ #cyberpunk

Editing: Anshar Studios
Animation: Anshar Studios
Music: Marcin Przybyłowicz
SFX and Mastering: Przemyslaw Laszczyk
End-Screen Animation: Radikal Studio
VO: John Q Kubin
